summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor to enter into and execute supplemental agreements for financial assistance in connection with the following elements of the City's Commuter Pool Program: 1975-1979 Commuter Pool Program (FAM 104); 1979 Commuter Pool Program (FAM 330); 1979 Vanpool Program (FAM 375); 1980 Commuter Pool Program (FAM 376); 1980 Vanpool Program/100 Van Expansion (FAM 377).
